Package view_controller

package view_controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    HowToPlayGUI
    The window which displays the rules of the game
    LeaderBoardView
    Displays the leaderboard of all saved accounts.
    LoginCreateAccountGUI
    Allows the user to create an account, login to an existing one, or play as a guest.
    StatisticsView
    Displays the current account's statistics.
    WinAnimation
    Plays a fireworks animation
    WordleGUI
    Allows the user to play a game of Wordle; coordinates game activities and input.
